name: Schedule Issues
description: Delays or changes in the project timeline due to unforeseen factors

name: Cost Issues
description: Problems related to budget overruns or financial shortfalls

name: Quality Issues
description: Defects or failures in construction quality that need immediate correction

name: Safety Issues
description: Incidents or concerns related to worker safety on-site

name: Legal Issues
description: Problems related to contracts, permits, or legal disputes

name: Resource Issues
description: Shortages or unavailability of materials, equipment, or labor

name: Communication Issues
description: Lack of clear communication between stakeholders, leading to errors

name: Permit Issues
description: Delays or problems related to obtaining the necessary permits or approvals

name: Subcontractor Issues
description: Problems with subcontractor performance, delays, or disputes

name: Environmental Issues
description: Concerns related to environmental impact, waste, or sustainability
